Text:
The TVRage link is a good one, but here's the imdb if anyone prefers: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1782017/

Kind of a UK 'Cops', looks like.... Though, i'd imagine it doesn't come with the authoritarian/right-wing framing of it's American cousin (haven't watched it, but if history is any guide...).

Documentary-style dealio.

Thx for the up - and thx to all s/l's. Appreciated
